xml:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="board" id="OS(9ob.j0=-d9#gTNxnt" x="-413" y="-612">
    <field name="type_">usb</field>
    <statement name="callbacks_">
      <block type="controls_loop_forever" id="f;Inb%^It.xAFMH4X@cv">
        <field name="async">FALSE</field>
        <statement name="do_">
          <block type="bit_button_event" id="{E1pKgr@yZbuYURvhn%K">
            <field name="var_">_bit_btnA_</field>
            <field name="event_">pressed</field>
            <statement name="do_">
              <block type="radio_channel_set" id="vv]uV--u`jXdJJ#/UC3V">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">發送廣播訊息後，才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="O[()f(4XKP{~VaW-SE*n">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <value name="msg_">
                  <block type="text" id="|q28Kj5,UDV6Vfad#Bii">
                    <field name="TEXT">Paul</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="radio_channel_get" id="(FiwSj=U7yVFO23]pmW`">
                <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">獨立使用，不需放在迴圈積木內，就能持續偵測頻道。</comment>
                <value name="name_">
                  <block type="text" id="h7lUi}[(V[d6U`?EM)DZ">
                    <field name="TEXT">1</field>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="do_">
                  <block type="bit_matrix_string_once" id="F%M2+Z3!.%HP{Q=nGx|%">
                    <field name="type_">1</field>
                    <field name="speed_">2</field>
                    <comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">若選擇一次，在跑馬燈結束後才會繼續執行下方程式</comment>
                    <value name="str_">
                      <block type="radio_channel_value" id="u2i-[nlxYXta_U2Q~SSM"></block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="color_">
                      <block type="colour_picker" id="a?PI+Lfc|5uDhMz6OjT9">
                        <field name="COLOUR">#33ff33</field>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="buzzer_play_music" id="c1EMS~u8hh+7ZaCCdUbU">
                        <field name="music_">m1</field>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="bit_button_event" id="l)^SitL%B,ECREV;LY6C">
                    <field name="var_">_bit_btnB_</field>
                    <field name="event_">pressed</field>
                    <statement name="do_">
                      <block type="bit_matrix_off" id="VDQ-7uVVI:a61(sb3@fY"></block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="delay" id="`!s@L.o:L%_j5A4i]g`A">
                        <value name="secs_">
                          <block type="math_number" id="VDXGj/=-[.wpLZlCyJ#-">
                            <field name="NUM">2</field>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>
